name: Word Search Puzzles: Brain Challenge Twist
name_original: Word Search Puzzles: Brain Challenge Twist
description:
Get ready for challenging, brain-twisting Word Search Puzzles!

Tons of puzzle themes to choose from! Will you excel at Animals? Or maybe Food will be your strong suit? Fancy yourself a Geography nerd? Or are you more of a Sports jock?

Challenge yourself with different quests that earn you coins! Use those coins to gain advantages in puzzle solving.

With thousands of different puzzle combinations, you'll never get tired of searching for words!

* Great for all ages
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Clean simple look
* Unlimited puzzles
* Challenging quests add another layer of fun
* HD graphics

WARNING: Downloading this game right now may cause brain challenging fun!
